title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - April 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for April 2019. All Pixel devices running Android 9 will receive these software updates as part of the April OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update with the latest features.

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview :

Build Number: PQ2A.190405.003
Notable fixes:
“Ok Google” Assistant hotword issue fixed
Pixel 3/ XL: Screen flash when engaging ambient display fixed
Pixel 2/ XL: Bluetooth disconnect issues fixed


Details of updates are found in this link :
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/pixel


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
